title: When This Supply-Chain Essential Goes Missing, It’s Time to Bring in the ‘Pallet Detectives’
excerpt: Millions of the wooden pallets go missing every month, creating headaches for suppliers and hiccups in the supply chain. Finding them takes some serious shoe leather.
